text: Czesław Justyn Cywiński (10 March 1926 – 10 April 2010) was the President of the Association of Armia Krajowa Soldiers. He was among those killed in the 2010 Polish Air Force Tu-154 crash. ==Honours and awards== 60px Polonia Restituta 1st Class (posthum.) 60px Polonia Restituta 2nd Class 60px Polonia Restituta 3rd Class 60px Polonia Restituta 5th Class 60px Cross of Valour 60px Silver Cross of Merit 60px Partisan Cross 60px Gold Medal for Merit for Country Defense == References == * Zginęli pod Smoleńskiem. title: Czesław Cywiński
